signature: <O, R extends Collection<? super O>> R selectRejected(final Iterable<? extends O> inputCollection, final Predicate<? super O> predicate, final R outputCollection)

enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before performing collection operations.
Collections need to be initialized before performing selection operations.
Verifying the state of the collections after the operation ensures the correctness of the selection process.
Asserting the contents of the collections helps in validating the results of the selection operation.
